ModMetaData.name: Everyone Is Bisexual!
ModMetaData.author: Xenofell
ModMetaData.description:
This mod forces all eligible pawns to spawn with the Bisexual trait. It increases the maximum trait count by 1 when this occurs to ensure that a useful trait is not lost.
Source code: https://github.com/cstamford/RimWorld_EveryoneIsBisexual
